document.title: DMC-S1000DBIKE-AAA-D00-00-00-00AA-00XA-A_005-00_EN-US

introduction.paragraph: The XML document DMC-S1000DBIKE-AAA-D00-00-00-00AA-00XA-A_005-00_EN-US.XML is a S1000D data module that provides information about bicycle controls and indicators.

introductionToControlsAndIndicators.paragraph: The following table(s) and illustration(s) provide the description and use of the controls and indicators pertaining to the mountain bicycle(s). Some controls and indicators may differ depending on the model.

tr.td: Lights illuminate automatically when brakes are engaged.
Press to sound bell. Normally used to signal a need for attention.
Push button to turn light on or off.
Control the acceleration of the bicycle.

dataRestrictions.dataDistribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.
dataRestrictions.exportControl: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.
dataRestrictions.dataHandling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
dataRestrictions.dataDestruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
dataRestrictions.dataDisclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.
